alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:44AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Perry and Dallas Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 744 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jefferson to near Thomasville to 6 miles east of Wagarville. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selma, Uniontown, Selmont-West Selmont, Orrville, Bogue Chitto, Gardner Island, Tyler, Central Mills, Old Cahaba Park, Dannelly Reservoir, Dallas County Horse Arena, Belknap, Dallas Lake, Memorial Stadium, Marion Junction, Burnsville, Potter Station, Carlowville, Safford and Hazen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
